benchmark_details.name: AgoraSpeech
benchmark_details.overview: AgoraSpeech is a meticulously curated, high-quality dataset of 171 political speeches from six parties during the Greek national elections in 2023, encompassing annotations for multiple NLP tasks and designed for political discourse analysis.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive, high-quality annotated dataset of political discourse, supporting various analyses and applications in political science and NLP.

data.source: Political speeches from the Greek national elections sourced from political parties' press offices and public communications.
data.annotation: Hybrid: Initial ChatGPT-generated annotations validated by human experts.

methodology.calculation: Calculated as the fraction of paragraphs where ChatGPTâ€™s annotation remains unchanged by human reviewers relative to the total number of paragraphs for each NLP task.
methodology.interpretation: A high accuracy indicates strong alignment between ChatGPT and human annotations.
methodology.baseline_results: Text classification accuracy: 89%, Sentiment analysis accuracy: 93%, Polarization detection accuracy: 88%, Topic classification accuracy: 61%.
methodology.validation: Utilizing a human-in-the-loop methodology for validating and refining ChatGPT annotations.
